file.name: courses.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Courses
  description: "Courses API"
  contact:
    email: anton93lev@gmail.com
  version: 0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
tags:
  - name: Courses
    description: Courses API
paths:
  /courses:
    post:
      tags:
        - Courses
      summary: Create course
      description: Create course functionality
      operationId: createCourse
      requestBody:
        description: Course creation request
        content:
          '*/*':
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateCourseRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: New Course created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreatedCourseResponse'
        '400':
          description: Validation issues in payload.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected server error.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
  /courses/{courseUuid}/publish-status:
    put:
      tags:
        - Course Publish status
      summary: Publish Course
      description: Publish Course
      operationId: publishCourse
      parameters:
        - name: courseUuid
          in: path
          description: Course UUID
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
          example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001
      responses:
        '204':
          description: Course published.
        '404':
          description: Course not found.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
        '409':
          description: Course not approved, course should be approved before publishing.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected server error.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'

components:
  schemas:
    CreateCourseRequest:
      description: Course creation model
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - description
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
          description: Course name
          example: Java 11 for beginners
        description:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
          description: Course description
          example: Course created for Java developers
    CreatedCourseResponse:
      description: Course model
      type: object
      required:
        - uuid
      properties:
        uuid:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001
          description: UUID of the company.
    RestApiError:
      type: object
      required:
        - code
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          example: ErrorCode
          description: Error code.
        details:
          type: array
          description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiError'
        innererror:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/InnerError'
        message:
          type: string
          example: Validation issues
          description: A human-readable representation of the error.
        target:
          type: string
          example: field
          description: The target of the error.
      title: RestApiError
      description: REST API Error.
    RestApiErrorResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiError'
      title: RestApiErrorResponse
      description: REST API Error Response. Full description about error response is represented in https://github.com/microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses
    InnerError:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          example: ErrorCode
          description: Error code.
        innererror:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/InnerError'
      title: InnerError
      description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Error: notImplemented: path "/courses": post: requestBody: contents: unsupported content types: [*/*]
